homeHeader: One in five Canadian businesses experience a cyber attack annually
preventionAndProtectionDescription: Strengthen your defences and never run into a cyber incident again with our Prevention & Protection package.
emergencyResponseDescription: Ensure that threats are dealt with as they happen with the 24/7 Emergency Response package.
simulatedEnvironmentsDescription: Discover vulnerabilities with this program, which includes extensive penetration tests and an IT simulation training package.
consultationDescription: Learn protect your online presence and receive invaluable consultation from our cybersecurity professionals.
aboutQuote: Creation is difficult, but destruction is easy.
aboutDescription: More and more criminals are going virtual since physical attacks are becoming harder than cyber attacks due to insecure IT infrastructures. At CyberAzo, we aim to secure and provide threat protection to every Canadian business, one at a time.
ourPackagesDescription: Cybersecurity does not have to be complicated when we have your back
ourPlansSectionHeading: Find the Right Plan for You
ourPlansSectionDescription: Not sure which plan is for you? Curious about our pricing? Contact us to get the answers to your questions.
resourcesQuote: From learning the basics to analyzing in-depth reports, AzoCyber has it all.
fullnameHelper: Enter Your First and Last Name (e.g.: Jane Doe)
solutionsPackageHelper: Select the package for which you would like to receive a quote
sendTechnicationText: Would you like AzoCyber to send a technician to your on-site location?
getAQuoteDialog1: Your Request A Quote form has been sent to our team!
getAQuoteDialog2: We will contact you in 3-5 business days.
getAQuoteDialog3: NOTE: If you selected the option for us to send a technician on-site, you will receive a separate confirmation before the appointment date.
selectDateTimeDescription: Select the date and time of when you would like our technician to arrive on-site.
organizationAddressHelper: Enter the address of your organization (e.g.: 111 Wellington St, Ottawa, ON K1A 0A6)
knowInAdvance: Is there anything we should know in advance?
knowInAdvanceHelper: Let us know any details we might need to know (e.g.: parking, entrance)
positionPlaceholder: Enter Your Position (e.g.: Security Analyst, Manager, etc.)
solutionsPackageOptionalHelper: Select an option if you are interested in one of our Solutions packages
contactConfirmation1: Your Contact form has been sent to our team!
contactConfirmation2: You will receive a response in 3-5 business days.
ourPartnersDescription: "AzoCyber has been our preferred cybersecurity provider for over 5 years" - Rachel Gagnon, CTO of Lorem Ipsum Inc.
